about.be a teacher and help learners: Be a teacher and help learners
about.get_rewards_desc: Expand your network, build your experience, and earn money.
about.motivate_learners_desc: Help learners achieve their goals, expand their knowledge, and develop their career.
about.teach_your_way_desc: Upload your recorded videos or start live streaming. Add your own content.
about.explain_courses: Let us explain the types of courses you will create
about.recorded_courses_desc: You can upload a recorded video on our site and increase the number of learners. Define your target audience, choose a promising topic, and provide value to other learners.
about.testimonial_quote_1: I am proud to be here. Although working as a full-time teacher is hard work, it allows you to work whenever, wherever, and however you want.
about.testimonial_quote_2: I am proud to be here. Although working as a full-time teacher is hard work, it allows you to work whenever, wherever, and however you want.

step1_title: Firstly, let us find out what type of course you’ll create
course1_description: You can upload a recorded made video on our website and increase the no of learners.Define your target audience, pick a promising topic and benefit other learners.
course2_description: Upload live videos and will help you to reserve your class with the capacity you need. Calendar schedule where you can adjust all your data. Submit your course link.
course3_description: Upload recorded videos but with scheduled live streamed. Adjust your schedule with date and time, number of students and set up your live link.
course4_description: You can prepare type of questions and quizzes. Online where learners can submit their answers or Offline as PDF where learners can download the questions.

step1.title: Choose the Type of Educational Course

quiz-component.title: Choose the Type of Quistion Bank
quiz-component.description1: You can create a question bank on any subject or field of your choice. Whether it's academic, professional, or just a topic you’re passionate about — help learners practice, test their knowledge, and grow.
quiz-component.title2: Add Questions to Your Uploaded Course
quiz-component.description2: Already uploaded your course? Now you can build a dedicated question bank around it. Create tailored questions for your learners to reinforce what they’ve watched and assess their understanding effectively.
